fi.grimripper.loww.movement

Class MovementMode.TileData

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.grimripper.loww.movement.MovementMode.TileData
  • Enclosing class:
    MovementMode

    protected class MovementMode.TileData
extends java.lang.Object
    Data object for storing tile-related data during movement radius generation. All data in this object applies to a single tile, and doesn't include anything that depends on direction, facing or templates.
    Author:
    Marko Tuominen

      • MovementMode.TileData

    • Method Detail

      • getMoveCost

        public float getMoveCost(Height height)
        Gets this tile's movement cost at a certain height. The cost must be calculated and set beforehand. Cost is impassable if it hasn't been set. Costs can be set separately for varying heights.
        Parameters:
        height - get cost for this height
        Returns:
        the move cost for this tile at the given height

      • isMoveCostSet

        public boolean isMoveCostSet(Height height)
        Checks if movement cost is set at a given height.
        Parameters:
        height - check if cost at this height has been set
        Returns:
        true if movement cost has been set

      • setMoveCost

        public void setMoveCost(float cost,
               Height height)
        Sets this tile's movement cost at a given height.
        Parameters:
        height - set cost at this height
        cost - set this as the tile's move cost

      • canBeOccupied

        public boolean canBeOccupied(Height height)
        Checks if the mobile object can occupy this tile. Also returns false if occupy check hasn't been made and the result saved.
        Parameters:
        height - can be occupied at this height
        Returns:
        true if tile can be occupied
        See Also:
        setCanBeOccupied(boolean, Height)

      • isCanOccupySet

        public boolean isCanOccupySet(Height height)
        Checks if occupy check has been done and the result has been saved.
        Parameters:
        height - occupy check has been done at this height
        Returns:
        occupy check has been done
        See Also:
        setCanBeOccupied(boolean, Height)

      • setCanBeOccupied

        public void setCanBeOccupied(boolean canBeOccupied,
                    Height height)
        Saves knowledge whether or not the host can occupy a tile. This applies only to the single tile.
        Parameters:
        canBeOccupied - whether or not the host can occupy this tile
        height - saves whether or not the host can occupy at this height
